text: The BlackRock Building is a skyscraper in New York City, United States. It is 246 meters (808 feet) tall and has 58 floors. It was built in 1963. At first it was named the Pan Am Building, but in 1981 the Metropolitan Life Insurance Company bought the building from Pan Am and in 1991 they changed the name to the MetLife Building and changes again as BlackRock Building in December 2024 until February 2025. ==Related pages== * List of tallest buildings in the world * List of tallest buildings in New York City == Other websites == * Official Site - MetLife Building * Emporis.com - MetLife Building * SkycraperPage.com â€“ MetLife Building Category:Skyscrapers in New York City Category:1963 establishments in New York (state) Category:Buildings and structures in Manhattan
title: MetLife Building
